component.name: OptimusUI
component.summary: Graphical interface for nVidia Optimus Laptops

description.p: This is a graphical user interface for Laptops with nVidia Optimus Technology (eg. switchable Graphics).
This application is most useful on older nvidia GPUs featuring the Pascal micro architecture like GTX 10 series or older as these lack proper power management using the proprietary nvidia driver.

It allows the user to select which GPU driver should be used for the entire system. Like running entirely on the iGPU (integrated graphics), entirely on de dGPU (nvidia) or in a hybrid offloading mode where the user can offload certain task to the dGPU.
Keep in mind Pascal and older GPUs will not turn off in hybrid mode and still consume power even if they are idle.
